body_html: @mrry hi mrry. I have encountered similar problem. I add queue runner to collection using tf.train.add_queue_runner function inside the conditional execution context. According to your reply , I should return the operations from true-branch and false-branch function. So I try to return the enqueue operations and the equeue from true-branch and false-branch function. But when I return the queue, tensorflow reports errors: "Expected binary or unicode string, got queue"
